name: Willow Wisp
text_description: The Willow Wisp, though not aggressive, uses its deep connection with nature to defend its allies. When this card is in play, it draws attacks towards itself, protecting other Nature type cards.
illustration_description: A small, faintly glowing green light hovers above a damp forest floor, entwined with the roots of a mighty willow tree. The surrounding environment teems with life, under the protective watch of the Willow Wisp.
